title: MiMo-Audio: Audio Language Models are Few-Shot Learners
summary: Existing audio language models typically rely on task-specific fine-tuning to accomplish particular audio tasks. In contrast, humans are able to generalize to new audio tasks with only a few examples or simple instructions.
